2. Data description
Include your physical data (biopsies, tissue samples) also in this list.
4. Metadata standards
Check whether using minimal information standards is useful, e.g. for flow cytometry (https://isac-net.org/page/MIFlowCyt ). There's a collection of such standards for biomedical research data: https://fairsharing.org/3518
7. Data sharing
Do you know which data repository you might use? There's a good list here: https://elixir-europe.org/platforms/data/elixir-deposition-databases
